targets.query:
from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> drop(columns:["connectome"])
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "neuron")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "membrane_potential" and r["dst_cortical_area"] =~ /^${dst_cortical_area:regex}$/ )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dst_voxel_x"] =~ /^${dst_vox_x:regex}$/ and r["dst_voxel_y"] =~ /^${dst_vox_y:regex}$/ and r["dst_voxel_z"] =~ /^${dst_vox_z:regex}$/ )
  |> drop(columns:["dst_voxel_x", "dst_voxel_y", "dst_voxel_z"])
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Neuron")

from(bucket: "data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "synapse")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "postSynapticCurrent" and (r["src_cortical_area"] =~ /^${src_cortical_area:regex}$/ or r["dst_cortical_area"] =~ /^${dst_cortical_area:regex}$/))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["src_neuron_id"] =~ /^${src_neuron_id:regex}$/ and r["dst_neuron_id"] =~ /^${dst_neuron_id:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["dst_voxel_x"] =~ /^${dst_vox_x:regex}$/ and r["dst_voxel_y"] =~ /^${dst_vox_y:regex}$/ and r["dst_voxel_z"] =~ /^${dst_vox_z:regex}$/ )
  |> drop(columns:["connectome", "src_voxel_x", "src_voxel_y", "src_voxel_z", "dst_voxel_x", "dst_voxel_y", "dst_voxel_z"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "dst_cortical_area",
    predicate: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "neuron"  or r["_measurement"] == "synapse",
    start: -1d
)
list.label: Destination Cortical Area
list.name: dst_cortical_area
list.query:
